definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: In many ways synthetic fibers are much better than natural fibers.
sentences.chinese: 在许多方面，合成纤维比天然纤维好得很多。

sentences.english: Allowed are inlays of natural fibres and viscose only.
sentences.chinese: 允许是镶嵌天然纤维和粘胶只。

sentences.english: The cotton and bast fiber are very important natural fibre crops in china.
sentences.chinese: 棉麻是我国重要天然纤维作物。

sentences.english: The transfer printing technology with disperse dyes for natural fibers is described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了用分散染料对天然纤维施行的转移印花技术。

sentences.english: As one of natural fibers, jute is grabbing more attention for its unique advantages.
sentences.chinese: 黄麻作为天然纤维的一种，其优势也正日益引起关注。

sentences.english: This natural fibre helps regulate body temperature and provides firm support and durability.
sentences.chinese: 这种天然纤维利于保持体温，稳固而耐久。

sentences.english: Silk is the strongest natural fiber in the world, as far as we know.
sentences.chinese: 蚕丝是史上全世界最强韧的天然纤维。

sentences.english: Spinning Machinery and Twisting Machines for Natural and Man Made Fibres.
sentences.chinese: 天然纤维和化学纤维用纺纱机及加捻机械。
